tool_description: Creates, updates, and deletes DNS records with validation and conflict detection across multiple DNS providers.

domain_name.description: Domain name to manage records for

action.description: Action to perform (create, update, delete, list)

record_type.description: DNS record type (A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, SRV, NS, PTR)

record_name.description: Record name or subdomain (use @ for root domain)

priority.description: Priority for MX and SRV records (0-65535)

error_messages: Invalid record type: Use one of A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, TXT, SRV, NS, PTR.
Invalid record value: Value format doesn't match record type requirements.
CNAME conflict: Cannot create CNAME record where other records exist for same name.
Missing required fields: MX records need priority, SRV records need priority, port, and weight.
TTL out of range: TTL must be between 300 and 86400 seconds.
DNS provider error: Unable to connect to DNS provider API.
Record not found: Cannot update or delete non-existent record.
Duplicate record: Record with same name, type, and value already exists.
usage: Specify domain, action, record type, and name. For create/update, provide record value and optional TTL. MX and SRV records require additional priority/port/weight parameters.

operation_status.description: Result of the DNS operation (success, failed, pending)

record_id.description: Unique identifier for the DNS record

changes_made.description: List of changes applied to DNS records
